title: Nesco BDM-100 Classic Bread Maker
description: Homemade bread without all the work. Just add the ingredients and let the Nesco Bread Classic Bread Maker do all the work. Choose from twelve Programs, each delay able up to 13 hours: Basic, French, Whole Wheat, Sweet, Ultra-Fast, Dessert, Pasta, Dough, Jam, Cake and Bake. Makes 1 to 1.5 lb. loaves with light, medium and dark crust controls. Also maintains a 10 minute auto resume function in case of short term power loss. Features a 60 minute keep warm function. Includes a non-stick pan, measuring cup and spoon. Also use bread machine to bake cakes, make jam and prepare dough for pizza, rolls and pasta. 580 watts; 120 volts.
